urls.description: Find out everything you need to know about your checked baggage allowance on British Airways flights, from how many bags you can take to bag weight limits.

data.text: @Shounakb06 Hello, please input your details into the following link, this will assist you further. https://t.co/5Ug0wCzHrl. You usually can take up to 23kg. However, you must be able to lift this into the overhead locker yourself or your bag will need to be offloaded into the hold. Kaycher
